title: 05/26/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/26/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's playoff games with Turner Sports NBA analyst Jim Jackson. Should Clippers fans be concerned at this point? Pro Football Talk Live co-host Chris Simms tells us which team Julio Jones should go to. And Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw talks about facing the Astros last night. Did you know he went to high school with Rams QB Matt Stafford?!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
